item.title: [pi] tried adding CW
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

first of all whatever you addded in actionhandler was duplicated which means try taking what you put in there out because itâ€™s already added. and try and compile so you have less errors so I can see what else needs to be fixed.
